## arrQuickSortNumeric

Efficient in-place recursive sorting algorithm of numeric values. Avg. Runtime: O(n log n) | Worst: O(n^2)

### Parameters

-   `arr` **[Array][3]&lt;[number][4]>** The numeric array to sort

Returns **[Array][3]**
